snippet: Baltimore prosecutors have asked a judge to impose an order preventing lawyers in the Freddie Gray case from talking about it.
abstract: Baltimore prosecutors ask judge to impose order preventing lawyers for police officers in Freddie Gray case from publicly discussing it.
lead_paragraph: Baltimore prosecutors have asked a judge to impose an order preventing lawyers in the Freddie Gray case from talking about it.

headline.main: Maryland: Judge Asked to Rein In Officers’ Lawyers
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Judge Asked to Rein In Officers’ Lawyers
